Notes: - Fixed issue with Tracked Apps disappear at random PC crashes.

- Meet Full History Chart Page! (displaying your activity day by day).
Simply click on 'Three Dots' button next to chart name in App Section.
- 'Start Minimized' option in Settings, the Application will start in system tray only.
- Added possibility to change the order of Apps. Drag&Drop the selected Application to the desired place and you good to go.
- Added 'Whats New' Screen so you will be notified each time new update is shipped.

- New Minimal View of Dashboard showing just really important info, no need to display big application window. Moreover you can always view details UI like before - press the 'i' button on the top right corner. Select 'Minimal Dashboard' in Settings (try it, You will like it believe me).
- Added Context Menu to the Application icon in Tray. It shows you current active time for tracked Apps without needing to open the ATA window. Just Right-click on it.
